scripts.setup:all: npm run setup:shared && npm run setup:plugins && npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:core
scripts.dev: npm run build:all && npm run dev:watch
scripts.dev:watch: concurrently --kill-others --kill-others-on-fail --kill-signal SIGTERM --names "plugins,shared,core,frontend,browser" --prefix-colors "cyan,yellow,blue,green,magenta" "npm run dev:plugins" "npm run dev:shared" "npm run dev:core" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:browser"
scripts.format: npm run format:core && npm run format:frontend
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check:core && npm run format:check:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:core && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:core && npm run lint:fix:frontend
